Activities at the Hub

Kids Community Football and Summer Fun Days
Nicholas Cross - 07852556274

Long Ashton Community Football, which started up in May, is providing fun and inclusive football sessions for Long Ashton and surrounding areas. Well attended by children from the community, the atmosphere and enthusiasm among the groups has been fantastic. The sessions are all about fun and building relationships whilst gaining a love for sport and physical activity.

Saturdays 1-3pm. Summer  Holiday Fun days will take place on 9th,10th & 11th August 2021 between 10am-2pm. Places will be limited so advice is to book early to avoid disappointment. Ring Nicholas on 07852556274 to book

Girls' Cricket
robtaffinder@googlemail.com

A girls's cricket team exclusively for Year-6 and upwards. Have fun mixing with other girls, as well as learning the skills of the game. If you’re already taking part in our mixed sessions, and would like to carry on, then that’s fine. But if you’d be happier in a female only environment, then this is the team for you. If you’re a mum or older sister who’d like to help on the coaching side. we’d love to hear from you too.Practice sessions are on Tuesdays, 6pm at Flaxmead.

Tuesdays 6pm

Train Master
somersetnorth@trainmaster.co.uk

If your child loves to play trains then look no further. Children’s event with rides on trains, giant track layouts, build your own tracks, Thomas Minis, superstations and lots more. We also offer sibling discount.

Wednesday 18th August 10.15-11.15 and 11.30-12.30 - Book now - somersetnorth@trainmaster.co.uk

Little City UK
jenny@littlecityuk.com

Mobile role play City for the under 5’s to explore, discover and enjoy. Utilising bespoke backdrops and specially selected high-quality toys and equipment.

Wednesdays every month

Pilates
rachel@rwpilates.com

Pilates is strong at the Hub and there is sure to be a group and instructor to suit you whatever your level - come and stretch and relax

Tuesdays, Thursdays and Fridays: Daytime and Evening sessions available

Creative Writing
info@flaxbourtonhub.org

Interested in writing a novel? Or perhaps some short stories or maybe a memoir. Whatever your writing interests let us know if you'd like to join a new creative writing group.

Flexible timing - group determines

Flax Tots
info@flaxbourtonhub.org

Bring your little ones to this fun play group and meet other local mums and dads

Monday mornings 10 to 11:30am

Weddings
info@flaxbourtonhub.org

Why not book the Hub for your wedding? With capacity for up to 150 guests and the beautiful countryside views for your photos the Hub makes a great venue

Now booking for Summer 2022

Team Meetings
bookings@flaxbourtonhub.org

The Hub can make a great venue for your team meetings or awaydays. contact bookings@flaxbourtonhub.org

Good availabilty

Birthday Parties
bookings@flaxbourtonhub.org

The Hub is a great venue for birthday parties whatever the age! The main hall is large enough for bouncy castles and traditional games like 'pass the parcel' and 'musical chairs.' The smaller partitioned area is perfect for laying out the birthday meal. 10% Discount for local residents applies.

Good availabilty - Contact bookings@flaxbourtonhub.org

Zumba
danielle.miles@fortetheatre.com

Pretty much the most awesome workout ever. Dance to great music, with great people, and burn a ton of calories without even realizing it. Zumba is coming to the Hub soon

Contact danielle.miles@fortetheatre.com for more info on dates and times

Advertise Your Activity or Business here
info@flaxbourtonhub.org

You can have your activity or local business advertised here at no cost. Send us your content and contact numbers and we will do the rest. We will even provde a suitable photograph too if you don't have one. Email us today at info@flaxbourtonhub.org

There is currently no charge to advertise wiith us
